author: Bloomberg News
title: Advanced economies will shrink this quarter four times as much as the record 2008 slump, says Goldman Sachs
content:
Advanced economies will shrink about 35 per cent this quarter from the prior three months, four times as much as the previous record set in 2008 during the financial crisis, according to annualized figures from Goldman Sachs Group Inc.
